programme.title: The Space Race, The Hubble, Chasing Comets & Space Debris

Servicing Hubble - Preparations for Hubble's final servicing mission. Chasing a Comet - Launch and the difficult path to rendezvous.

programme.title: Project Mercury, The Mars Express & The Soyuz Launch System
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E02, Project Mercury Begins - The start of NASA & America's first manned space program. Mars Express - The European Space Agency's Mars Satellite. The Soyuz Launch System - The gradual evolution of Russia's Soyuz launcher.

programme.title: Project Mercury Advancement, Camera Tracking & The International Space Station
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E03, Project Mercury Advances - America's first manned space program finally puts a man in orbit. Camera Tracking - The array of special cameras that follow a spacecraft at launch. The International Space Station - The building and operation.

programme.title: Project Gemini, Venus Express, EMU & Deep Space Communication
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E04, Project Gemini Commences - Did Gemini give the US a lead in the space race? Venus Express - The last days of ESA's Venus probe. EMU - NASA's Extravehicular Mobility Unit. Deep Space Communications - ESA's worldwide network of giant dishes.

programme.title: Project Gemini Advances, Cassini at Saturn & More About Mars
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E05, Project Gemini Advances - NASA refines the techniques needed for rendezvous. Cassini at Saturn - In the Cassini probe's final years of activity, its handlers are asking it to do more complex and risky assignments.

programme.title: Project Gemini Docking, Mars Curiousity & Satellite Swarms
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E06, Project Gemini: Docking and EVA - In the final phase of the Gemini program NASA struggles with docking and spacewalks. Curiosity Roving Mars - On the surface of Mars the Curiosity rover is changing the way we think about the red planet.

programme.title: The Apollo Program Begins, Caves & Planck
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E07, The Apollo Program Begins - At the very beginning of NASA's moon project things go wrong. Caves - ESA's special training program for astronauts. Planck - Mapping the cosmic microwave background radiation.

programme.title: Rebuilding Apollo, Orbiting Carbon & Zero Gravity Training
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E08, Rebuilding Project Apollo - After the Apollo 1 disaster NASA resumes manned space flight. Orbiting Carbon Observatory 2 - Monitoring the Earth's Co2 levels in unprecedented detail. Zero Gravity Training - Parabolic flights.

programme.title: Beyond Earth Orbit, IXV Vehicles & Galileo Satellites Lost and Found
programme.desc: Trajectory - Milestones in Space Exploration, S01E09, Beyond Earth Orbit - The Apollo program takes bold new steps. IXV Re-entry Vehicle - Europe is working to perfect a re-entry vehicle. Galileo Satellites Lost and Found - Navigation satellites go into incorrect orbit.

programme.title: Gone in a New York Minute
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S03E02, In a city of eight million, landlord Bruce Blackwood disappears without a trace in March 2006. Though there is no body, the NYPD is sure this is a homicide and they spend the next nine years searching for answers.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E06, A videotape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women. And a DA investigator in Georgia helps crack a murder case that his father, a police chief, first worked on 30 years before.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E13, A 14-year-old boy is charged with the murder of his sister, but his public defender believes the real killer is still on the loose. And two deteriorated slides, made 16 years earlier, give police the evidence they need to reopen the cold case.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2011, A boy's toy Batmobile car provides an important clue for detectives struggling to make a case against a serial killer who stalks and kills waitresses.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E21, Detectives are baffled when two young girls are raped, murdered, and dumped in an abandoned house in Akron, Ohio. And a 26-year-old mother of three disappears on Christmas Eve in 1995, but the missing person case goes cold when police can find few clues

programme.title: The Bone Keeper
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E22, In December 1985, when human bones are discovered in the woods, it puts an end to the search for missing teen David Reed. David's skull fractures point to murder; but it will be decades before investigators can find his killer.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E24, A mother is suspected in the murders of two of her daughters when her third daughter finally convinces police to reopen two cold cases.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E21, A quarter of a century after the murders of two nurses, Canadian police suspect that a former Toronto cop committed the crimes. A blow to the head of a garbage collector in San Jose leaves strange markings.

programme.title: Missing in Altoona
programme.desc: Cold Case Files, S02E03, When Sherry Leighty goes missing in 1999, her family is left wondering how a dedicated mother of three could vanish without a trace. A decade later, the cold case heats up when Sherry's sister launches a social media campaign.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S05E05, Law enforcement officials fear they may have to release a serial killer from prison until a 24-year-old murder case gives them a chance to lock him up for good.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E24, A bloody dagger and a phone tap help detectives solve a 20-year-old murder case. And DNA taken from an eyelash found on a dead prostitute's body brings a killer to justice.

programme.title: Green River Killer/Missing And The Dead
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E13, Police reopen a rape-murder case 25 years after the crime and find enough DNA evidence to bring him to justice. And a confession made to a "Baywatch" TV star helps police solve the three-year-old riddle of a wealthy Newport Beach woman's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E2004, Investigators in Virginia, probing the murder case of a sailor, seek the help of a forensic anthropologist from the "body farm" in the Great Smoky Mountains. Dr. William Bass became an expert on the human body's rate of decay by watching bodies.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Family Secret/Justice Delayed
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S02E05, Forty-one years after the crime, a woman implicates her brother and cousin in the murder of a policeman.
MST3K: Gunslinger, 19931009000000 +0000, The widow of a murdered sheriff attempts to clean up the crime in her small town with help from the man hired to kill her.

MST3K: The Day The Earth Froze, 19930116000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots learn the ins and outs of the circus in the short Here Comes the Circus (1946) and then try to make sense of the Nordic fairy tale film The Day the Earth Froze (1959).
Film Crew: The Wild Women of Wongo, 20070911070000 +0000, Bob Honcho orders the Film Crew to provide a commentary track for the bizarre prehistoric adventure film, The Wild Women of Wongo (1958).

MST3K: Being From Another Planet, 19920704000000 +0000, Joel and the Bots watch a re-edited version of Time Walker (1982) called "Being From Another Planet" in which a mummy awakened by a university team goes on a killing spree.

MST3K: Bloodlust, 19940903000000 +0000, Mike and the Bots watch a cheap ripoff of The Most Dangerous Game, where a rich game hunter tricks a group of stranded college kids into becoming prey for his latest blood sport.

MST3K: Bride Of The Monster, 19930123000000 +0000, Horror cinema icons Bela Lugosi and Tor Johnson star in this Ed Wood classic as the crazed Dr. Vornoff and his beastly assistant Lobo, who conduct heinous experiments on human victims in an effort to create a race of atomic super-beings.
MST3K: Catalina Caper, 19901013000000 +0000, Two college boys enjoy Catalina Island sunshine, scuba diving, and beach 'bunnies', while another boy's con-artist parents scheme to sell a stolen scroll.
MST3K: Cave Dwellers, 19910531070000 +0000, Wise ruler Akronas (aka “The Great One”) is the keeper of an incredibly powerful but potentially deadly device.
MST3K: Daddy-O, 19910720000000 +0000, The crew riff on the short Alphabet Antics before watching Daddy-O (1958), a film about a group of teenage beatniks

While You Were Dating, 20170212000000 +0000, A divorced couple meet online and end up going on a blind date together. After an awkward reunion, they decide to set each other up with their friends, but old habits never quite die. Stars Billy Baldwin and Stefanie VonPfetten.

A Painted House, 20030427000000 +0000, 10-year-old Luke had never kept a secret or told a lie. But when two groups of migrant workers-and two dangerous men-come to work the family's Arkansas cotton farm, mysteries suddenly flood Luke's world.
A Perfect Christmas, 20160716000000 +0000, A newlywed couple invite their very different families to Christmas. A Hallmark Original Movie.

A Place for Annie, 19940501000000 +0000, Sissy Spacek stars as a caring nurse who adopts an HIV positive baby but must fight prejudice and the natural mother who wants custody. Also stars Mary-Louise Parker and Joan Plowright. From the Hallmark Hall of Fame Collection.

A Ring by Spring, 20140308000000 +0000, A fiercely independent single woman is forced to consider marrying her not-so-perfect boyfriend when a gypsy fortuneteller convinces her she must be engaged by the spring or risk a lifetime alone.

Once Upon a Winter's Date, 20210214000000 +0000, Katherine, a workaholic executive, endures the worst Valentine's Day date of her life. On her walk home, a gypsy weaves a magical spell on her and when she wakes up the next morning, she realizes it's Valentine's Day again.

programme.title: Secrets, Lies and School Supplies
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Trace and the O'Briens attempt to put their own challenges aside.

programme.title: Pasts and Presents
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. Jess turns to her mother for help planning her cousins wedding.

programme.title: Photographs and Memories
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E03, Hallmark Original Series. Abby sends her girls off to their first day at a new school.

programme.title: It's Always Nashville
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E04, Hallmark Original Series. Trace hits the road to record an album with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Buried Treasures
programme.desc: Chesapeake Shores, S02E05, Hallmark Original Series. Nell discovers a treasure map that Bree made as a teen.
Pack of Lies, 19870426000000 +0000, A thriller about a middle class family which are suddenly thrown into a world of international intrigue. Stars Ellen Burstyn and Alan Bates.

programme.title: The Shrine
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E06, On a flight back to Atlantis, McKay inexplicably falls ill. Fearing the worst, the doctor summons McKay’s sister to say her goodbyes. But Ronan tells Jeannie of a shrine that would grant Rodney one day to be himself again, before he dies.

programme.title: Whispers
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E07, Dr. Beckett (Paul McGillion) is asked to delay his departure from Atlantis when word comes that Major Anne Teldy (Christina Cox) and her away team have stumbled onto one of Michael’s abandoned labs inside an extensive underground catacomb.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S05E08, Keller and the Atlantis team meet with the Wraith, Todd, to deliver a startling proposition. Keller believes she has found a cure for the Wraiths of their need to feed on humans but requires a test subject for this breakthrough treatment.

programme.title: Lost
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E15, Trapped beneath ruins in an underground maze, some of the Destiny's crew are stranded when the ship jumps back into FTL. The situation grows even more desperate when Rush (Robert Carlyle) learns that Destiny will soon be leaving the galaxy!

programme.title: Sabotage
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E16, With crew members stranded, Destiny continues to cross from the present galaxy into the next one. Unable to alter the Destiny's course, Dr. Rush calculates the Destiny will fall short of making it to the next galaxy, stranding them indefinitely.

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E17, Members of the crew begin experiencing disturbingly realistic hallucinations. With the hallucinations spreading to other members of the crew, Dr. Johansen (Alaina Huffman) must track down whatever is causing the episodes before someone dies.

programme.title: Subversion
programme.desc: Stargate Universe, S01E18, After Dr. Rush has a disturbing dream, he suspects that Telford may be a spy for the Lucian Alliance. Rush confides in Col. Young who suspects there may have been residual memory overlap during the doctor’s switch with Colonel Telford days before.

programme.title: Sacrifices
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E09, Teal'c and Bra'tac have just returned from the planet Ha'ktyl, where they tried to convince the warrior-woman rebel leader Ishta, to wait until her fellow insurgent Jaffa grow numerous enough to wage war against all the Goa'uld system lords at once.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E10, The Stargate is missing. Upon investigation the team notice a scientist tagging the stargate with a locator beacon. It looks like this is the work of The Trust taking whatever ruthless action they deem necessary to protect Earth from alien invaders.

programme.title: Gemini
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E11, An old IDC comes through; Send M.A.L.P. The M.A.L.P. telemetry shows that the person sending the transmission is Carter but Carter is in the control room at SGC. The Carter on the other side explains that she is a Replicator.

programme.title: Prometheus Unbound
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E12, A mission has been greenlit to take the Prometheus to the Pegasus galaxy. Jackson wants in. O'Neill feels he is too valuable to risk. The decision is overridden by the mission commander, none other than Gen. Hammond, now head of home world security.

programme.title: It's Good To Be King
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E13, Hoping to warn Harry Maybourne of Goa'uld attacks, SG-1 arrives at his last known whereabouts to find that he has been appointed king of a primitive people and believes he possesses writings by a time-traveling Ancient predicting these events.

programme.title: Full Alert
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E14, When O'Neill finds the door to his home forced open and former Vice President Kinsey waiting for him inside, his first instinct is to call the police. But he allies himself with Kinsey when he learns of a rogue organization known as The Trust.

programme.title: Citizen Joe
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E15, At a tag sale, civilian Joe Spencer comes across a small stone that gives him visions of SG-1 in action. Delighted, he shares the stories with anyone who will listen. But when he learns that SG-1 really exists, his excitement turns into obsession.

programme.title: Reckoning (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E16, Teal'c and Bra'tac believe the time is right to lead their people in an uprising against the Goa'uld. Their plan suffers a setback when an army of Replicators begins to systematically take control of Goa'uld ships and Jackson is taken prisoner.

programme.title: Reckoning (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E17, Hidden in the ruined temple on Dakara is an Ancient weapon powerful enough to destroy the Replicators. Thanks to a timely warning, the team knows it. And thanks to Daniel's repressed Ancient knowledge, Replicator Carter knows it as well.

programme.title: Threads
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S08E18, With a climactic battle behind them, the team turns towards personal matters. Unbeknownst to them, Anubis prepares one final attempt! Meanwhile, Jackson awakens in a way station between the living world and the world of beings that have ascended.

programme.title: Hazardous To Your Health
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E018, Dylan and Valerie fly to Mexico, where they hope to rescue Erica and reclaim Dylan's inheritance.

programme.title: Little Monsters
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E019, Kelly distances herself from everyone that matters to her as Finley's hold on her grows stronger.

programme.title: Stormy Weather
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E021, Brandon seeks Dylan's help with both taking down Professor Finley's cult-like organization and reuniting with his girlfriend, but when it comes to Kelly all bets are off.

programme.title: Alone At The Top
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E022, As the new owner of the After Dark, Valerie uses her newfound leverage to force Ray to continue their affair. But Ray has never been one to follow orders.

programme.title: Love Hurts
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E023, The campus is in an uproar when an alleged rapist is released from custody. Despite his alibi, the students are sure that Lenny is responsible for the string of crimes on campus.

programme.title: Unreal World
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E024, A documentary for a class project reveals intimate secrets about the gang and threatens to tear apart some long-standing couples. Meanwhile, Jesse makes a confession to Andrea.

programme.title: A Song For My Mother
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E026, Ray is unhappy that David has come to Portland. David panics when he discovers that his mother was fired, no longer lives at her last known address, and hasn't cashed her alimony checks for months.

programme.title: Squash It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E027, Steve and David organize a hip-hop night at the club to boost the sagging gate receipts. David asks Willie's nephew Juwan, a talented DJ, to join him onstage.

programme.title: Girls On The Side

programme.title: P.S. I Love You Parts 1 and 2
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S05E031, Jim and Cindy leave for Hong Kong. Kelly wants to continue her relationship with Brandon, but he cannot get over the rejected marriage proposal.

programme.title: Home Is Where The Tart Is
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E01, Kelly returns from a modeling stint in New York. Donna enjoys her summer with Ray, who has made an effort to make up for his past mistakes.

programme.title: Everything's Coming Up Roses
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E04, Donna, Kelly, Clare and Valerie try out for the Tournament of Roses Court. Brandon and Susan cover the Rose Court tryouts for the newspaper, and attend the party together. Toni surprises Dylan when they go motorcycle riding.

programme.title: Lover's Leap
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E05, Valerie is haunted by nightmares about her father's suicide. David learns that his mother requires shock therapy to improve her chances of recovery. Toni throws a dinner party while her father is out of town.

programme.title: Speechless
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S06E06, Valerie gets herself invited on a road trip with Kelly, Donna and Clare. Steve convinces Brandon to let a director film a movie at the Walsh house. Marchette tells Toni that Dylan is using her.

programme.title: Point of Attack
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E06, After helping break up a gang fight on the beach, Eddie gets the idea of having some gang members join the lifeguard W.A.T.E.R. program designed to help troubled youths.

programme.title: Sandcastles
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E07, Baywatch lifeguards gain insight into the plight of the homeless when Hobie befriends a girl who's living on the streets. Eddie is attacked by a former mental patient known as “Hector the Collector.”

programme.title: Thin or Die
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E08, Eddie goes on a blind date with Nicole, who turns out to be morbidly overweight, which leads to complications and an unlikely friendship. But Nicole's diet pills prove life-threatening. Meanwhile, Mitch’s life is comically disrupted by a stray dog.

programme.title: The Trophy, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E09, Eddie is arrested for statutory rape after a teenage girl lies about seducing him in his tower. Meanwhile, Eric Turner, bitter about the paralyzing accident he suffered as a lifeguard, returns to Baywatch to reconcile his relationship with Megan.

programme.title: The Trophy, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E10, Eddie is suspended from Baywatch over the statutory rape charge. He feels abandoned when no one believes his innocence pleas. Meanwhile, the reckless, paraplegic Turner, wanting to win Megan back, tries to impress her by hang-gliding off a cliff.

programme.title: If Looks Could Kill
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E11, Mitch falls for the beautiful woman he saved from drowning after she drove her car off a cliff, unaware that she's a cold-blooded murderer and con artist who was attempting to dispose of the murder victim of her latest scam when Mitch rescued her.

programme.title: Reunion
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E12, Mitch and his ex-wife Gayle reconnect at their twenty-year high school reunion with unforeseen results. Eddie discovers an abandoned baby under his tower with a note imploring him to take care of it for 24 hours.

programme.title: War of Nerves
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E13, Drug lord Mason Sato is released from prison and determined to seek revenge Mitch Buchannon, who helped send him away. When Sato kidnaps Hobie and Kaye, Mitch and Sato end up in a samurai-style fight to the death.

programme.title: Big Monday
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E14, Reports of a coming storm and enormous waves bring painful memories for Mitch. Meanwhile, Kaye tries to persuade the parents of a deaf girl to send her to sign-language school.

programme.title: Sea of Flames
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E15, A drugged-out drifter torches Eddie's lifeguard tower which leads the team to discover an illegal, lab distributing a new drug. Mitch and Thorpe try to convince the city board to buy wave runners in order to optimize their ability to save lives.

programme.title: Now Sit Right Back and You'll Hear a Tale
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E16, Eddie slips on the sand and hits his head on the tower ramp. When he regains consciousness, Eddie finds himself on an island with Gilligan, Mary Ann and the rest of the castaways.

programme.title: The Chamber
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E17, Mitch has an out-of-body experience when his attempt to save a trapped diver without scuba gear leaves him with the bends, dangerously close to death and in desperate need of a decompression chamber.

programme.title: Shark's Cove
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E18, Shauni is suspicious when a swimmer training for the Olympics disappears in "Shark's Cove.” Eddie's world is turned upside-down when he is reunited with his schizophrenic half-brother.

programme.title: The Lost Treasure of Tower 12
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E19, A bohemian poet flirts with Shauni, and with danger when he uses his metal detector to find the buried stash of two jewel thieves.

programme.title: The Big Spill
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E20, Mitch helps a former lifeguard, Lane Brody, investigate a corporation suspected of dumping deadly chemicals in the bay.

programme.title: Game of Chance
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E21, Harvey and Mitch go to play poker on an offshore yacht where they are robbed by a masked man that drives an amphibious Jeep. Shauni invites Eddie over for dinner at her parents’ house where her snobbish father strongly disapproves of him.

programme.title: Summer of '85
programme.desc: Baywatch, S02E22, Shauni and Eddie visit a local fortune teller who predicts that Eddie will soon meet his first true love. Shauni thought he already had, and that it was her! But it's Lorna, an older woman Eddie had a "Summer of '42" affair with as a teenager.
